title: build: dragonfly-amd64 builder broken since April 19th
body:
From http://build.golang.org/log/88b8d8099fa3386966d859854d9db45621a7c66e:

    ERROR: Cannot find /go1.4/bin/go.
    Set $GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP to a working Go tree >= Go 1.4.

According to https://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/DashboardBuilders, that bot's operated by Justin Sherrill.  I think that's @fupjack.
